CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 8 Hence , design of photovoltaic polymers with broader absorption toward longer wavelengths , especially in the near - infrared ( NIR ) range , is necessary for high efficiency conjugated polymer donor materials.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| photovoltaic polymers |
| conjugated polymer donor materials |

In this paragraph, the two "Material Name" entities are "photovoltaic polymers" and "conjugated polymer donor materials". These terms refer to specific types of materials used in the design and development of solar cells and other optoelectronic devices.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| photovoltaic polymers |

In this revised list, the "Material Name" entity is "photovoltaic polymers". The term "conjugated polymer donor materials" is not included because it is a more general category of materials that includes photovoltaic polymers as a subset. Therefore, "photovoltaic polymers" is the most precise and specific "Material Name" entity in this paragraph.
